channel.title: Beers on bad to the code
channel.description: Recent content in Beers on bad to the code

item.title: The Belgian beer landscape
item.description: More than a year ago I started scraping a beer website to test web scraping and to have fun and interesting text data to analyse. Let’s see if we can reproduce the analysis and push it a bit further in the next couple of posts. Both in terms of analysis of the Belgian beer landscape as in terms of analysing the beers through the reviews of the site’s members.
